name: Daclau-Sar
content:
Daclau-Sar

Lord of Carrion

Source Inner Sea Gods pg. 328
Pathfinder Wiki Daclau-Sar

Details

Alignment CE
Pantheon Nascent Demon Lords
Areas of Concern Carrion, scavengers
Domains Animal, Chaos, Destruction, Evil
Subdomains Demon (Chaos), Demon (Evil), Feather, Fur, Rage
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Spiked gauntlet
Symbol Hyena jaws eating bones
Sacred Animal(s) Hyena
Sacred Color(s) Black, tan

Obedience

Eat at least a pound of carrion. Gain a +4 profane bonus on saves against disease.

Boons - Demonic Obedience

Demoniac

Source Book of the Damned - Volume 2: Lords of Chaos pg. 38
1: First Boon (Sp) death knell 1/day
2: Second Boon (Sp) contagion 1/day
3: Third Boon (Sp) beast shape IV 1/day

Boons - Nascent Demon Lords

Source Book of the Damned pg. 124
With very few exceptions, a demon lord is never born fully formed. Instead, each must build power and resources during an extended period of transformation. Demons in this transitional stage are known as nascent demon lords.

At any one time, there exist hundreds-if not thousands- of nascent demon lords in the Abyss. Those who have been associated with the Inner Sea region are summarized here. All nascent demon lords are chaotic evil and range in power from CR 21 to CR 25. The boons they grant are less complex than those granted by demon lords, manifesting as spell-like abilities usable twice per day each.

1: death knell
2: contagion
3: beast shape IV
